author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37463, introducing a customization function for the scenario in which there is no simulation of the bad strips in the Outer Tracker, but only the inefficiency due to the bias rail in the macro-pixel sensors.
I profit of this PR to add also to the matrix a battery of relvals to exercise the various scenarios.

#### PR validation:

Run successfully: `runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 23234.111,23234.112,23234.113,23234.114` (when merged together with  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37576)
Also ` runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade --show | grep OT` gives:
